title: Django setup in Ubuntu for begineers
author: harshraj8843
description: Django is a high-level Python Web framework that encourages rapid development and clean, pragmatic design. Built by experienced developers, it takes care of much of the hassle of Web development, so you can focus on writing your app without needing to reinvent the wheel. Itâ€™s free and open source.

title: How to find and replace text in linux
author: harshraj8843
description: SED command Syntex for find and replace text in same file sed -i 's/<old_text>/<new_text>/g' file.txt Syntex for find and replace text and save to another file sed 's/<old_text>/<new_text>/g' file.txt > newfile.txt Syntex for find and replace text containing '/' /hii => bye sed -i 's/\/hii/bye/g' file.txt /hii => /bye sed -i 's/\/hii/\/bye/g' file.txt
